settings.subheading: Use this text area to share information about your brand with your customers. Describe a product, share announcements, or welcome customers to your store.

settings.title: When will you send my order?
settings.answer:
We usually ship out orders within 1~5 business days after payment clear.
During the special events the ship out time can be delayed as the number of orders increases, and we will put a notice to make sure to avoid any misunderstanding.

settings.title: Is this a genuine item?
settings.answer:
Sure, we only sell 100% genuine and new items in our store.
We receive products directly from the manufacturer or the official retailers. There is no need to be concerned about the product's authenticity.

settings.title: How can I contact to Slowrecipe?
settings.answer: There is a 'contact us' button on the bottom of page, just click the button. Then, you will be able to send an email directly to slowrecipe.
